You can visit the official Verus website at https://veruscoin.io to learn more about Verus, its technology, and the community.

What are some resources available to learn more about Verus and its technology?

There are several resources available to learn more about Verus, including articles on how Verus solved nothing-at-stake and weak subjectivity for proof of work, guides to VerusCoin, spotlights on the Komodo ecosystem, and information on the formation of the Verus Coin Foundation.

What is the focus of the Verus Coin Foundation?

The Verus Coin Foundation has a vision of creating a Public Blockchain as a Service (PBaaS) system, which aims to provide a decentralized and scalable platform for building blockchain-based applications.
